questions.text: What is the difference between admin.ModelAdmin and UserAdmin?

choices.text: No difference between the two.

admin.ModelAdmin is the generic base class used to customize how any model appears in the Django admin. UserAdmin is a specialized subclass of ModelAdmin designed specifically for user models, with built-in support for: password hashing, permission management, groups, staff/superuser fields,user creation and change forms
The difference is only in the fieldsets.
admin.ModelAdmin is not hashing the passwords, while UserAdmin is.
